Je určen pouze pro osobní užití a nesmí být šířen. * Více informací na http://www.itnetwork.cz/licence */ import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import "bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css"; import "bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.bundle.min.js"; import { use } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; const PersonTable = ({ label, items, deletePerson }) => { const [persons, setPersons] = useState([]); const [page, setPage] = useState([]); const [totalPage, setTotalPage] = useState([0]); useEffect(() => { axios .get(`/api/persons?page=${page}&size=${ITEMS_PER_PAGE}`) .then((res) => { setPersons(res.da) }) }) return (

{label} {items.length}

{items.map((item, index) => (
{index + 1} - {item.name}
  • Zobrazit
  • Upravit
))}
Nová osoba
); }; export default PersonTable;
